title: General Practice. the Integrative Approach
cleaned_text: No hay productos en el carrito General Practice. the Integrative Approach Phelps, K. — Hassed, C. 1ª Edición Enero 2011 Inglés Tapa dura 1104 pags 3400 gr 21 x 27 x 6 cm ISBN 9780729538046 Editorial CHURCHILL LIVINGSTONE LIBRO IMPRESO 124,80 €118,56 €IVA incluido Recíbelo en un plazo De 7 a 10 días The aim of the book is to provide a comprehensive General Practice text book which takes a contemporary, integrative approach to diagnosis, investigation and management of health issues and disease states encountered in the general practice environment. The book will cover the philosophy underpinning general practice in the 21st Century, and deal with primary and secondary prevention fully options, as well as potential pitfalls according to the growing evidence base in this area. The book is directed at best practice rather than alternative practice. The first section of the textbook lays the foundations and principles of Medicine and the second section by detailing the allopathic medical and consulting knowledge required of a standard GP text, discussing physiology and plans discussion of the therapeutic the treatment associated factors, essentially practitioners with the knowledge required to adapt approach to meet the needs of the individual patient. A national panel of experts with experience in Chinese medicine, herbal medicine, nutritional medicine, naturopathy, and exercise therapy have contributed to their fields of expertise management that utilise in and promotion be an icon, throughout the book the icon will appear near the corresponding therapeutics text for easy modality reference - Unique FAMA, Adjunct Professor, School Public Health and Discipline General Practice, University of Sydney, Australia and Craig Hassed, Senior Clinical Lecturer, Deputy Head of Department, Department of General Practice, Monash University [Tel 91 593 99 99](tel:003491 593 99 99) Fax 91 448 21 88 [Dir](/contacto) C/ Artesanos, 46 C/ Artesanos, 46 Parque Empresarial Prado del Espino 28660 Boadilla del Monte Madrid [Mailinfo@axon.es](mailto:info@axon.es)
